text: bahutharaya soya ganima sandaha aandu pakshayath, wipakshayath sidukarana balapam hamuwe manthriwarun pirisak siya niwasawalinda iwathwa gos jangama durakathana pawa kriya wirahitha karagena sangawi sitina bawa wishwasa katayuthu aaranchi marga heli kaleya.

wayalat wirakon saha pitar siriwardhana samagin sisiliyana dayas gayu ”dingisi dingare” nam bayila githaya da, ”anatha tharuniya” yanuwen gayu kawipela da, ”sitha -sitha pathiwatha rauki pa්riya dewi”, ”athitha kale uthum”, ”jananayaka sinhala bhedaya” saha ”maheshakhya sihalun” wani kewala gayana da, tayitas samarawira mahatha samagin gayu ”bandhula pe්rami sha්ri sukumari” saha ”siri sara alankara lumbiniye” wani yuga githa da, ema yugaye athishaya janapa්riyathwaya ta path wiya. 1939-45 wakawanuwe sisiliyana dayas jhakhambaapaeesh samagamata githa 14 k pamana gayana karana lada athara, saha ga්ramofon githa nataka kipayakata da (”perakodoru bana saha anthima kamaththa”, saha ” sha්ri wika්rama”aadi ga්ramofon githa nataka ) wenuwen swaraya musu kala ya.

jaya shri maha bo samindu lakdiwata wadamawimath samanga arambauna bawata salakena aluth sahal mangalyaya perahara hela charithranukulawa magul khera, hewisi nada ha hela sanskruthikanga madhyaye nagenahira wahalkadin athulu wi shri maha bo samindun padakunu kota pamina wali maluwe udu wiyanakin ha pawadin sarasana lada wishesha pitikawe thanpath kara athi ran aalepitha pathrayata sahal pirawima aarambha kerini.
oone tharam pidawan hithata enawa.

ohu me bawa sandahan kale doha hi stafard shri lanka pasale bharakara mandalaya samaga janadhipathi karyalaye pawathwu sakachchawedi janadhipathiwaraya wethama ya.

ee nisa narendra modi agamathithuma chinaya samanga wishesha hithawathkamak athikara ganiwida, eseth nathnam chinaya samanga athi mithrathwaya samanya mattamakin pawathwagena yana athara kalapaya thula prashna mathu wi athi japanaya, wiyatnamaya wani ratawal samanga suwishesha mithrathwayak athikara ganida, eseth nathnam modige me aagamanaya nisa indiyawa saha chinayath, indiyawa ha japanayath athara athiwana thani thani mithrathwayan hethu karagena nawa aasiyanu mithra sabandatha jalayak athiweyida kiyana eka danata kiyanna baha.

thama niwasema itha rahasigatha lesin mema karmanthaya pawathwagena gos thibu athara sakakaru athadanguwata path wu awasthawe pathurum thuwakku walla kotas 1 yi, pathurum ha ithiri athaawarana kotas 2yi, bora 12 es. ji. wargaye unda 3 yi, bora 12 es.ji wargaye nawatha pawichyen pasuwa nawatha purawana lada unda 1 yi, 5 siro wargaye jiwa unda 3 yi, es. el. aar. wargayata thawath jiwa unda 3 yi, 308 ankaya athi jiwa unda 1 yi, ti56 unda 2yi, es 84 wargaya jiwa unda 1yi, 9 em.em. wargaye jiwa unda 3yi, pawichchi kara athi bora 12 ye pathurum kopu 12 k mehidi sakakaru samanga athadanguwata path wiya.

uthsawa samaya aarambha wimath samaga janathawa wadi washayen eekarashi wima sambandhayen awadhanaya yomukaraminuyi yuda hamudapathiwaraya me bawa kiya sitiye.thawath korona aasadithayin 160 kme athara, ada dinayeth me dakwa korona aasadithayin 160 k wartha wu athara ee anuwa samastha korona rogin sankhyawa 94,724 k dakwa ihala giya.esema, 184 deneku ada dinaye suwaya labu athara me wanawita suwaya laba athi samastha korona rogin sankhyawa 91,456 k.motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwen niwedanayaklabana sanduda rajaye wishesha niwadu dinayak wuwada motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwe narahenpita saha werahara karyala menma pradeshiya karyala da samanya paridi sewa sapayana bawa motar ratha prawahana departhamenthuwa niwedanaya kala.
labana sathiye withara weyi.”

rusiyanu githa rasikayanta handunwadima ehi ek piyawaraki.thanuja ese kiya siti.rusiyanu gi ragath sanyuktha thatiyata wiktar rathnayaka, rohana wirasinha, karunarathna diwulgane, kasun kalhara, athula adhikari, ruwan wirasekara, thissasiri perera, jayantha rathnayaka, jagath wikramasinha, kapila pugala aarachchi, nelu adhikari, moris wijesinha, kithsiri jayasekara, wasantha thilakangani, samitha mudunkotuwa, pi්rayantha direks wani parampara dekaka shilpihu sangithayen ha gayanayen ekwi sitithi.hemamala randunu

diwayine siyaluma pradesha thula sidu karanu labana maduru mardana katayuthu thawaduratath shakthimath kirima menma maduru mardanaya pramithikaranaya kirimakata bhajanaya kota gunathmakabhawaya wadi kirimata mema athpotha upayogi kara ganu labe.
eeth aluth leda athi wuna,
deshapalanaya banata, pirithata, mangulata, kayiyata sambandhaya.
wiwahaya me masa agadi....
